channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Controller

item.title: CVE-2022-34888|2024-08-03T09:22:10.892Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller
item.description: The Remote Mount feature can potentially be abused by valid, authenticated users to make connections to internal services that may not normally be accessible to users. Internal service access controls, as applicable, remain in effect.

item.title: CVE-2022-34884|2024-08-03T09:22:10.816Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller
item.description: A buffer overflow exists in the Remote Presence subsystem which can potentially allow valid, authenticated users to cause a recoverable subsystem denial of service.
